A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
After the movie finished I had a smile on my face it was a good movie\, great sound\, great visuals. The thing that made me question things was more lore wise\, it just appeared that there was no real stories answered. Snoke character was a let down\, Finn and Rose were not so interesting in this movie\, Princess Leia though had some good scenes there was one scene that was a bit cringy.
Luke even though Mark Hammil was fantastic as always I think his character was let down and would of prefered Mark's take on Luke.

Rey and Kylo were fantastic\, enjoyed their characters very much only let down for me was Rey's parents. Also some other things like physics lol. 

All in all it was an enjoyable movie but does leave you with some questions to why more background story was not given to characters.
